error.noAddressOrToken: No server address or token found

about.title: About SoulFire
about.description: You are running version {{version}} of the SoulFire client.

createInstance.title: Create a new instance
createInstance.description: Instances need friendly names for you to distinguish them. It can be any name you want, for example, "My Minecraft Bot".

friendlyName.label: Friendly name
friendlyName.description: The name you want to give to this instance.
friendlyName.min: The friendly name must be at least 3 characters long.
friendlyName.max: The friendly name must be at most 50 characters long.
friendlyName.regex: Friendly name can only contain letters, numbers, and spaces

url.description: Loading from URL will make the SoulFire server make a GET request to the target server and use the response as the data.
